name: adc-phase2
description: Adriano Dental Clinic Online Management System

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:inventory" "npm run dev:billing" "npm run dev:prescription" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:portal"
scripts.dev2: concurrently "npm run dev:billing" "npm run dev:portal" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:apibilling"
scripts.dev3: concurrently "npm run dev:inventory" "npm run dev:portal" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:apibilling"
scripts.dev4: concurrently "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:portal" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:apibilling"
scripts.dev5: concurrently "npm run dev:maintenance" "npm run dev:portal" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:apimaintenance"
scripts.build: npm run build:inventory && npm run build:billing && npm run build:prescription && npm run build:admin && npm run build:api && npm run build:apiappointment
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd adc-inventory && npm install && cd ../adc-billing && npm install && cd ../adc-prescription && npm install && cd ../adc-admin && npm install && cd ../api && npm install && cd ../api-appointment && npm install
